messages.description_nomic:
Text channel for communication without a microphone
Voice room ID: {0}
messages.set_channel_description: Voice channel `{0}` has been set as a parent.
messages.set_category_description: Category `{0}` has been set as the parent category.
messages.reset_channel_description: Use `/channel set` to select a new channel
messages.reset_category_description: Use `/category set` to select a new category
messages.reset_locale_description:
The default locale `{0}` is now used.
Use `/locale set` to select a different one
messages.hint_none_channel_description: For the bot to work properly, you need to set the parent channel, by entering which the user can create his own private voice channel. Set the parent channel with the command `/channel set`
messages.hint_none_category_description: For the bot to work properly, you need to set a parent category, within which a private channel will be created for the user. Set the parent category with the command `/category set`
messages.hint_none_locale_description:
This server uses default `{0}`.
To change it use `/locale set`
messages.error_text_channel_description: The selected channel must be a voice channel.
messages.help_server: Commands must be run on the server
messages.help_cmd_channel:
Set parent channel
Must be a voice channel

messages.forbidden_description: You must have **Administrator** right to set up private channels
messages.dm_description: Commands can only be executed while on the server
messages.admin_description: You must be bot owner to perform this
